item.title: Run Adhoc Tasks on DC/OS
item.description: DC/OS can run Marathon or Kubernetes for orchestrating long running tasks and Metronome / Chronos for scheduled ones. That leaves space for a mechanism to run ad-hoc tasks that do not need to be treated as long running nor scheduled ones.
